content.title: Day 1 : Initializing ..
content.creator:
richard bousquet
August 22, 2015
content.content:
Hi people,
You're a pilot?
Our job is to teach you ...
By starting this project on kickstarter we aim two goals: get the money needed to start our school and make known all around the world. i'm a french FPV racer who wants to share knowledge and technics around drone world. Interested in first by race, i work also on specific training programs to several professionnal axes.
Have an idea of this new technology offer to us on my blog you'll find some example from friends on net. visit : http://kojiwan.wix.com/dar10#!blog1/cbm0 and please talk around you.
I am listening to your any questions on the project.
Have a nice day...
